label: ProductLabel
comment: A label, such as a garment label or a radio frequency tag, used for identifying a product.

datatypeProperties.comment: The date, time, date time, or other date time value, for the attachment of this product label.
A unique barcode identifier for this supply chain trade line item.
A brand name, expressed as text, for this experience product.
A statement that user needs of the present are met without compromising the needs of future generations.
The code specifying the type of tag for this product label.

referencedBy.comment: A product care label specified for this trade product.
A product label specified for this trade product.
